lines.text: Have you ever truly idolized a woman? Nothing can be obscene in such love. Everything that occurs in between it becomes a sacrament.
It's no fun hurting someone who means nothing to you.

She came to see me when I got out of Intensive Care. She said, there's bad news and there's good news. You're paralyzed from the waist down - permanently. OK, I said, let's have the good news. That was the good news, she said. The bad news is that from now on, I'm taking care of you.
What happened to your dance classes?
Dancing has to come from the heart.
So?
My heart is broken.
I want to marry you. I want to give you babies. I want to give you the rest of my life!
I don't want the rest of your life. I want my own.
Everyone has a sadistic streak, and nothing brings it out better than the knowledge you've got someone at your mercy.
Believe me dear lady, children are a better form of marital therapy than any trip to India.
In the eyes of every woman, I could see the reflection of the next.
We were developing a narcotic dependence on television - the marital aid that enables a couple to endure each other, without having to talk.

Nothing ever surpass the rapture of that first awakening. I might have been Adam with the taste of apple fresh in my mouth. I was looking at all the beauty in the world embodied in a single female form and I knew, with sudden blinding certainty, this was IT!
I'd been granted a glimpse of heaven, then dumped on the sidewalk of Rue d'Assas.
You don't have a right to criticize yourself. It's my privilege.
She's a man-trap! Look what she did to me!
Are you feeling any better?
Better than what?
You know, this afternoon... in the loo?
The loo? Is that your usual pick-up routine?
